message.body: This is sean. Dorie did give me a bum number. Sometimes I wonder who's side she's on.
Heh, Dorie is a sneaky lady. Thank you again SO MUCH for tonight!
No problem pal!
I am unable to locate the various tapes (for spiking and gels) Where are they kept?
Bucket under stairs to loft
Or toolbox
Not gonna be at space till maybe 3 or 4 today, there's nothing that really needs much doin, so just keep me posted on projector and lemme know when you head over!
Aye aye. I've talked to infocus and my old boss, a bit of advice but not really a lot of help. I've put out feelers in other places, I'll let you know wh
at I come up with. I've contacted a few people on craigslist, to see if there are cheap replacement options. I've had one response, the projector is more
of a toy than anything else, but it's cheap and we can possibly make it work. And again, your projector works, but only in black and white. We could gel
it, and at least get some color. If I can't find anything suitable before the show,that might be our best option.
Okey doke. Any leads on rentals?
Somewhat expensive; around $100 / wk seems to be the going rate.
Yuck. K. How much is the toy?
Also!!' just remembered I am doing a marketing study tomorrow and getting $200! So maybe I can get another one...
$50, but I may have something better for a similar price. No remote, but it's an infocus as well and our remote may work with it. In any case, the toy do
esn't have a remote either. This would be bigger, and require a different mounting system, and if we can't figure out remote control then I'll have to fi
gure on some other way to control it
But it would be better than nothing. And kennedy, the burden is mostly on me to make this right.
Okey, well if it has a horizontal keystone maybe we can put it in the loft. Just keep me updated! And it was totally an accident, no worries. I really appreciate you figuring out a solution!

Ok. I am going to run errands, should be back by 3 do anytime you want to come over after that? If that works for you? 3 screws/washers, eyelets and s hooks and 2 clamps and extension cords is all we need right?
That seems right. Sounds good. I'll look to see if I can find any extension cords as well. 3 is perfect, I'll see you then.
At the rocket cat, about to head back. Want coffee?
I have some, thanks!
Iminami movie night! Are you free this Sunday eve? Will try to find a time that works for all.
I could see my way to sunday! Any time is fine. I'm a man of elasticity.
Yet still so strong. Awesome! Will keep you posted!
Yes! Yes!
Also! Bring a VGA cable too!
Yay!
We are all fools as far as connecting things to things.
Or lemme know if you don't have a VGA cable and I will run to tranny and get mine
Secured!
You are the great connector.
I'm at work, can't rally answer my phone, txt me if you need anything!
Aye! It was to ask entrance to transmissions, as Jeremy neglected his phone, on the hope that you were present as well. All is now resolved. Thank you!
Found a cuff link!
They will sing of your heroism long after the rest of us are forgotten!
I will trade it for a game of settlers of catan!
I was warned to not deal lightly with you, that you'd exact a price in blood or board games.
My thirst for blood can only be vanquished by the crushing defeat of my opponents on the table top
Fiume?
Already present. You are expected.
Still on for tonight? What's yr addy?
Whenever you like! 7/8 ish!
Then let's say 7:30 in the spirit of compromise, a thing that often evaporates during the course of board games and which we should appreciate while available.
Consider this compromise the last then! 7:30 it is, and destruction soon to follow.
On that point, there's no argument.

He-ey! You happen to be around yr place in an hour ish? I'm out with a client near you and tis such a lovely day for a drink....and I would love to talk to you about this....pretty shitty situation....having a little trouble grokking it right now.
Ach, unfortunately not, I accelerated my trip to jersey to get my car back before the weekend, otherwise I'd love to... But yeah. This isn't really grokable.
Sure sure. Enjoy the jerz! I'll see you sooooon I hope!
